org.ejvm.execution

Interface EjvmExecutionListener


  • public interface EjvmExecutionListener

    Provides an interface for listeners informed about the steps of the execution of an EjvmProgram. Attach an instance of this interface to an EjvmProcess to have its methods invoked before and after the execution of the program's instructions.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sebastian Nicolai Kaupe

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Invoked after the execution of every instruction of an EjvmProcess.
      void beforeExecution(EjvmProcess process, EjvmInstruction instruction, Number... args)
      Invoked before the execution of every instruction of an EjvmProcess.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeExecution

        void beforeExecution(EjvmProcess process,
                   EjvmInstruction instruction,
                   Number... args)

        Invoked before the execution of every instruction of an EjvmProcess.

        Parameters:
        process - The EjvmProcess in which the EjvmProgram is executed.
        instruction - The EjvmInstruction executed.
        args - The arguments for the instruction.

      • afterExecution

        void afterExecution(EjvmProcess process,
                  EjvmInstruction instruction,
                  Number... args)

        Invoked after the execution of every instruction of an EjvmProcess.

        Parameters:
        process - The EjvmProcess in which the EjvmProgram is executed.
        instruction - The EjvmInstruction executed.
        args - The arguments for the instruction.
